front.title: Transmission of IPv6 Packets over Aeronautical ("aero") Interfaces

abstract.t: Mobile nodes (e.g., aircraft of various configurations) communicate with networked correspondents over multiple access network data links and configure mobile routers to connect their on-board networks. Mobile nodes connect to access networks using either the classic or mobility service-enabled link model. This document specifies the transmission of IPv6 packets over aeronautical ("aero") interfaces.
